channel.title: Saral Theme
channel.description: A simple theme for personal blog sites, created for Astro framework

item.title: BIM Is Not a Model: It’s a Series of Intentional Lies Told at Different Times
item.description: A provocative piece explaining why models are intentionally incomplete, how assumptions are encoded, and why treating BIM as ground truth causes downstream risk.

item.title: Why “Level of Development” Is Still Widely Misunderstood (And How It Breaks BIM Contracts)
item.description: A practical breakdown of LOD vs Level of Information vs Level of Geometry, with real examples of where expectations fail between designers, contractors, and owners.

item.title: The Hidden Cost of Over-Modeling: When BIM Detail Actively Reduces Project Quality
item.description: Explores performance, coordination noise, false confidence, and why “more detail” often increases error rates instead of reducing them.

item.title: Why Clash Detection Is the Least Valuable Thing BIM Can Do
item.description: Reframes BIM value around decision timing, information ownership, and design intent, not just geometry collision.
